choose.when: AND m.uid IN (SELECT u.id FROM f_user_account u INNER JOIN f_user_role r ON u.id=r.user_id WHERE r.role_id in (2,3,4))
AND m.uid IN (SELECT c.uid FROM f_user_customer c WHERE fid=(SELECT fid FROM f_user_customer WHERE uid=#{uid}))

mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.mid, l.pid, l.gid, IFNULL(l.lname,'null') lname, l.lmac, ls.x, ls.y, ls.off, s.id sid, m.project_id, p.name, m.mname, m.mesh_id, pl.pname, IFNULL(sc.scount,0) scount FROM f_light l INNER JOIN f_light_setting ls ON ls.lid=l.id LEFT JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id=l.mid LEFT JOIN f_scene s ON s.mid=m.id LEFT JOIN f_project p ON p.id=m.project_id LEFT JOIN f_place pl ON pl.id=l.pid LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) scount,mid FROM f_scene GROUP BY mid) sc ON sc.mid=l.mid WHERE l.id=#{id} LIMIT 1
